comment: Professor Thornton was a very easy going and interesting professor, however he was very difficult. He only had 2 grades for the entire semester, which were fill in the blank tests. His "test review" did not have anything to do with the test and almost everyone in my class failed it due to this. Would highly recommend a different professor for this.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: Professor Thornton was very entertaining but his tests were really hard. There were 2 tests that were fill in the blank. If you need "cushion" grades to help out your   grade DON'T take him. The 2 tests were the only grades we had all semester and we didn't find out what we made on the 1st test until after the last day to drop w/o academic penalty.

Wally is great. I took criminal procedure with him and the tests were hard, because they were fill in the blank, but criminal investigation tests were SO easy. I got a B in criminal procedure and an A in criminal investigation. Didn't really study for either class. Just pay attention. If he knows your face and name, he'll take that into account.

Most classes end 15 early. He reads highlighted stuff in his book for 10 minutes, then story time, at some point he goes around asking everyone a question fishing for an obvious answer. He gives an exam review that makes taking notes unnecessary. Exams here are fill in the blank, list, no word bank despite what he says. 10% attendance, 2 45% exams.

2Tests are all fill in the blank (no word bank)-- Don't know what everybody means by the test are easy. Very unclear of what exactly will be on the test just expects you to know it all. Nice guy, I loved going to class but I was disappointed that he does not respond to emails in a timely manner and refuses the use of D2L. :( Hard to find syllabus.

Wally is fantastic; class is just friendly discussion. You get to know your classmates. 2 45% exams. First is matching with a study guide, second was a scenario. He'll learn your name. 10% attendance, so be on time to class. It's fun and I would take him again. Lots of personal stories. We almost always let out 15-30 minutes early.

Just your typical old man. He's a cool and funny guy. I've taken him twice, he's assigned no homework ever. Your only grades are tests. First time I took him they were multiple choice, this time they're all matching. Straight from the book. Only caveat is he often says "this will be on the test" and it's not. Lectures STRAIGHT from textbook.

Wally is simply awesome and he absolutely loves what he does. I've taken 3 courses with Wally and would gladly take more if I he taught anything I needed. His classes are very simple and straight forward. All you need to do to earn a good grade is show up, participate, and highlight what he mentions from the book.
Great guy and a great professor. Lots of conversation and he expects students to participate in the discussion. You will learn a lot and have fun.

Wally is the best professor by far. He loves Kennesaw State and truly enjoys teaching and talking with his students. All you have to do is go to class and highlight what he talks about in the book. So easy. And he is very entertaining so 8ams are completely bearable.

I took Criminal Courts with Totten the semester before and received an A but at least the textbook was decent and he had PowerPoint slides to refer to. Thornton gives no notes, jaws on and on about his time as a cop. Should have known when he used My Cousin Vinny as a teaching tool. Don't waste your time - worst professor ever.

Overall Good.Teaches directly out the book class consisted highlight everything he says. Gives topics to study for the midterm and final. I would recommend studying everything b/c for the final he gave 30 topics that would be covered on the exam only 6 out of the 30 were on the final everything else was stuff that he said we didn't have to study

The best professor I have ever had at Kennesaw. I was an education major who switched to criminology and his class confirmed why I switched. The class was super fun and hands on. Very easy tests and practical applications. Iwanted to go to class because he made the class so exciting with personal stories and his great sense of humor!

Fantastic professor! But if you want a boring and traditional professor, Wally is not for you! He does not use any powerpoints but teaches straight from the book but will make class fun with stories and class participation. Only grades in course are tests and attendance. Highly suggest for any CRJU course. He is my favorite prof at KSU!
Wally is awesome. One of my all time favorite professors. Tests are all vocab straight from the book. Took the class at 8am and was never tired or bored. Actually a really fun class.

Wally is a really down to earth professor and you can learn a lot just from his stories. Anyone who attends college just to read and memorize from a text book is obviously stuck in their high school days.

Wally's class is fun. I took it in the summer. 3 tests & attendance are your grade. The tests are multiple choice & matching & come directly from definitions in the book. I got B's on all the tests, but got an A in the class. He gets everyone to participate. Very easy & enlightening class.
He is a nice guy, but "NOT the BEST professor". The class is a joke ..just buy the book and teach yourself. I expected more from this class.
one of the best professors i've ever had

One of the best professors at KSU in the Criminal Justice Department!! The book is really interesting and hard to put down. He knows the material very well and will often share personal experiences with the class. The classes (which were at 9:30am) were so much fun I attended every single one! I strongly recommend taking ANY class Wally teaches!!

Wally is a great professor. He knows the material & has a lot of personal stories. He is very clear on his grading. He expects you to attend class & believes you should get your money's worth.Class is never boring. He is very sarcastic so don't take things too seriously & you will enjoy the class. He enjoys getting to know his students which is a +
GREAT TEACHER!! Class is awesome. He has been there and done that so he knows the material. Classes are fun and he is hands on!  TAKE WALLY HE IS AWESOME!!
Police in America, Mr. Thornton is an awesome professor! He enjoys teaching and unlike some teachers he is actually good at it. Students that listen will learn!

Professor Thornton is the standard in which all professors should apply themselves.  He is very animated, intelligent, and knows how to make every class a fun and enjoyable learning experience.  Do not pass up the opportunity to take one (or more if possible) of his classes.  AMAZING Professor!

I have Wally right now, and I love the class! He makes the tests easy, and he makes the class enjoyable! He shares his experience on the force, and he definitly likes to have his students inputs. I feel like my opinions were respected, and I would definitly recommend taking him! I'm taking him again!

At first I didn't like him, but he grew on me. He's a retired police officer. He tells you exactly what to study for tests (2) and one practical, not many grades so go well! He's hilarious and kept me interested.
excellent instructor. He valued my opinion. Kept my interest. I look forward to having him again. some students were crying, I guess that they wanted a grade
He was easy at first but then he changed and made things more difficult. Kind of confused as to how I got a B when all of my grades were A's.

If you actually want to learn something this is not the professor to take. He says he wants everyone's opinions respected, but I certainly did not feel that way. He does not teach you what the experts say but what he believes to be true. You are learning the Wally way.
